Uses of Package
risk.views.ui

  • Packages that use risk.views.ui 
    Package Description
    risk.model.maputils
    The risk.model.maputils package contains the class implementing the territory The riskBoard and the continent classes
    risk.views
    Package contains the views of the game
    risk.views.ui
    Package contains the various UI components of the risk game
  • Classes in risk.views.ui used by risk.model.maputils 
    Class and Description
    Vertex
    Implements the Vertex Class
  • Classes in risk.views.ui used by risk.views 
    Class and Description
    CardExchangePanel
    This class implements the Card Exchange panel it extends JPanel and implements Observer
    RiskGraph
    Implementation Of the Risk Graph
    RiskMenu
    This class contains a custom JMenu item to be added to the game view, extends JMenuBar
    SidePanel
    The Side Panel extends JTextArea Implements Observer It is used to log and display the History of the various State And step taken throughout the game, as well as the info on the various countries
    StatePanel
    The State Panel extends JPanel Implements Observer It is used to show the current state of the game
  • Classes in risk.views.ui used by risk.views.ui 
    Class and Description
    Vertex
    Implements the Vertex Class
